Detailed Description

Simple packet for input and output via the Client class

The IOPacket class provides a simple packet structure to make the passing of data to the MACSim server via the client easier. This class does not allocate memory for the m_values buffer. Use IOPacketWrapper for convenient allocation/deallocation of this buffer.
